_source.short_desc: Web conferencing tool that helps businesses with instant messaging, voice & video calls, voice messaging, desktop sharing, conferencing
_source.long_desc: Web conferencing tool that helps businesses with instant messaging, voice & video calls, voice messaging, desktop sharing, conferencing. Designed for midsize to large businesses in consulting, finance, healthcare, and other industries, it is a web conferencing tool that provides team messaging, remote collaboration, and more.
_source.target_audience: Designed for midsize to large businesses in consulting, finance, healthcare, and other industries, it is a web conferencing tool that provides team messaging, remote collaboration, and more.

category_features.name: Brainstorming
category_features.definition: Group collaboration to solve ideas in a productive and concentrated manner.

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: Discussions / Forums
category_features.definition: Online forums/groups where users can ask questions, share ideas, best practices, etc.

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Real Time Editing
category_features.definition: Preview and make real-time changes in content

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Adds audio/visual capabilities for remote learners and instructors

category_features.name: Electronic Hand Raising
category_features.definition: Participants can alert the Host that they have a question when they are muted.

category_features.name: HD Audio/Video
category_features.definition: High-definition audio capability

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: On-Demand Webcasting
category_features.definition: An on-demand webcast is a pre-recorded presentation, which is available online at the viewer?s convenience.

category_features.name: Presentation Streaming
category_features.definition: Stream slide presentations during the web conference to present it to the audience

category_features.name: Presentation Tools
category_features.definition: Share and present designs

category_features.name: Private Chat
category_features.definition: Send text messages to selected individual(s) from the entire audience

category_features.name: Real-Time Chat
category_features.definition: Engage in direct, instant messaging

category_features.name: Recording
category_features.definition: Record live video calls to play later

category_features.name: Screen Sharing
category_features.definition: Digitally share screen view with others

category_features.name: Two Way Audio & Video
category_features.definition: Presenter can see and hear participants and vice versa.

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Adds audio/visual capabilities for remote learners and instructors

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is where collaboration happens. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered.

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: Share a document. Collaborate and comment. Securely store files. Dropbox Business has everything you need for your digital workspace.
related_products.features: Share a document. Collaborate and comment. Securely store files. Dropbox Business has everything you need for your digital workspace. Dropbox Business is trusted and used by over 300,000 business teams worldwide and over 50% of the Fortune 500 for its industry leading file sync, collaboration, and extensive administration and security features that scale as teams grow.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by millions, Basecamp puts everything you need to get work done in one place.
related_products.features: Group chat alone isn't enough. Basecamp combines *all* the tools teams need together in one place: message boards, schedules, to-do lists, group chat, documents & file storage, and more. Instead of stuff scattered all over, everything you're working on will be in one streamlined, organized place. Everyone will know what to do. Nothing will slip through the cracks. You'll always know exactly whats going on.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across a multitude of systems.
related_products.features: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across everything from your mobile and desktop devices to telephones and conference room systems. Special features include cloud and local recording with transcripts and multi-user annotation capabilities via screen share.  Easy access with one click, chat across platforms and share files all with encrypted, compliant settings for extra security.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a collaboration tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
related_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

related_products.short_desc: Bring your teams work together, and unify your workflow. Create, collaborate, and store information all in one place.
related_products.features: Evernote Business brings your teams work together. Create documents, collaborate on projects, and store information all in one place. Teammates can access, edit, upload, and share notes and files from any device--even if theyre offline. Cut through the noise, and quickly find the information you need with powerful search capabilities and integrations with tools you already use. Unify your workflow with Evernote Business.

related_products.short_desc: Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.
related_products.features:
Messaging that powers collaboration. Anytime, anywhere. 

-Collaborate beyond meetings, internally and externally
-Connect with teams before, during, and after meetings, in spaces organized around your work.
-Collaborate with anyone, inside or outside your organization-all from the same space.
-Collaborate across applications
-Co-edit documents and use many of your favorite apps-all without leaving Webex.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
similar_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

similar_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the world's best collaboration tool with fully customizable and proprietary features that make it a must-have for any team
similar_products.features:
With features like assigned comments, Chat, Inbox, notifications, threaded comments, Reminders, task priorities, Time Tracking, Goals, dependencies, and custom statuses, ClickUp has everything you need to streamline collaboration for any project or team!

Used by 100,000+ teams in companies like Airbnb, Google, and Uber, ClickUp is the perfect collaboration tool that brings all of your team's work into a single app. Built for teams of all sizes and industries.

similar_products.short_desc: Lucidspark is a virtual whiteboard where teams can bring their best ideas to light. Brought to you by the makers of Lucidchart.
similar_products.features: Lucidspark is a virtual whiteboard where teams can bring their best ideas to light. Brainstorm and collaborate as a team in real time, no matter where you are. Lucidspark helps people organize notes and scribbles and turn them into presentation-ready concepts. When it's time for next steps, teams can develop workflows and process documents to turn ideas into reality. Features include: integrations, sticky notes, freehand drawing, chat, templates, timer, voting, breakout boards, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: The platform for creative collaboration-where distributed teams meet, work, and make decisions. Get started free!
similar_products.features: Bluescape is the platform for creative collaboration. Streamline workflows with all your ideas, assets, iterations, and entire projects into one secure virtual workspace. With built-in voice and video calling, simply gather your team in Bluescape and make quicker decisions. Reduce meetings and finish projects faster in a secure platform trusted by Fortune 100 companies, government agencies, and the world's largest movie studios.

similar_products.short_desc: Leading creative collaboration and online proofing platform for agencies and brands.
similar_products.features: Ziflow is the leading creative collaboration and online proofing platform. Ziflow helps agencies and brands deliver exceptional creative content. One platform for clear feedback on video, digital, web, documents, images, audio, banners, GIFs, and much more. Flexible workflow for faster approvals. Integrated with leading creative and project management apps. SOC2 security certification. Customers include Showtime, McCann Worldgroup, AWS, Weber, Specialized and Dupont.

similar_products.short_desc: Wrike is an enterprise collaboration software with prebuilt templates, time tracking, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, and more.
similar_products.features: Wrike is an award-winning team collaboration software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Create a streamlined digital workplace using custom request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, real-time updates, and performance reports all in one place that can be shared company-wide. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to automate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more. Work smarter, not harder with Wrike.

similar_products.short_desc: More than ever, we need a place to bring everyone together and help each person succeed. That's Jostle.
similar_products.features: Jostle's not just a collaboration tool-we're an employee success platform. Our platform is purpose-designed to help people connect, communicate, and celebrate together. It's a single place where everyone can find what they need, clarify what matters, and celebrate success. The result? Happier employees, lower turnover, and higher productivity. Join the 1000+ organizations already enjoying successful workplaces, like ASOS, the University of Illinois, & Citizens Bank.

similar_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
similar_products.features: Asana is a collaboration tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, enables online collaboration that is redefining how teams work.  Its familiar and easy-to-use interface, coupled with file sharing, Gantt charts, and work automation features have helped Smartsheet quickly grow into a favorite business app for productivity.

**#1 Productivity App of 2013 - Tech Impact Awards
**Best Business App of 2014 - Evernote Platform Awards

similar_products.short_desc: Participate is an online platform for streamlining the set-up and management of social learning communities.
similar_products.features:
Participate allows organizations with models that depend on social learning communities to scale their initiatives, with no loss in quality, while streamlining their operations. 

Using our social learning platform, customers can easily create, grow, and sustain social learning communities. Our ability to capture, aggregate and and give recognition for knowledge created in these communities is our key differentiator.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on collaboration for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.
similar_products.features: HighQ's modern, adaptable, and continuously-learning legal workflow platform delivers an open and scalable foundation, embedded machine intelligence and analytics, and smart integration points with firm-critical applications. Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: The collaborative work management leader, connecting where teams communicate, plan, and execute, all in one scalable solution.
similar_products.features: Adobe Workfront is a collaborative work management solution that addresses the challenges of disconnected teams, siloed tools, and the relentless pace of enterprise work. Workfront brings teams together in one secure solution and empowers them to move quickly and produce high-quality work together. Workfront helps teams collaborate, manage review and approval cycles, and automate project workflows-whether they're in the office or on the go, and all without leaving the context of their work.

similar_products.short_desc: A completely reimagined UI, enhanced search and filters, easywork allocation, new portfolio dashboard, and more to transform your work.
similar_products.features:
Zoho Projects is a cloud based project management software with over 200,000 customers worldwide. It helps you plan your projects, and execute them with perfection. 

With Projects, you can assign tasks easily, communicate effectively with both your team and clients, be informed on all project updates, get detailed reports on work progress and deliver projects on time, everytime.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Community software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Community tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Community software allows businesses to connect with their customers by creating a space for sharing ideas, collecting opinions, storing Q&A data, and interacting with fellow customers and business representatives.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Screen Sharing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Screen Sharing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Screen Sharing software allows presenters and meeting participants to share the screens of their computers with other participants' computers or with projecting devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Social Networking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Social Networking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Social Networking software supports customer interactions with one another as well as with the organization. Search Engine optimization, blogging, podcasting, newsletters, profile pages, message boards, viral content and membership directories are all Social Networking software features, which can increase web-traffic, visibility, and interactivity for companies with a web presence. Social Networking is related to Contact Management software, Content Management software, Membership Management software, and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Team Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Team Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Team Management software utilizes integrated communication capabilities and project/task management functionality to assist managers with improving collaboration, communication, and productivity within teams and team-related projects, whether remotely or in the office.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Web Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Web Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Web Conferencing software enables organizations to conduct interactive conferences and meetings online. Typical features include: two-way audio, video conferencing, application sharing, presentation streaming, presence/availability detection and electronic hand raising. Web Conferencing applications also often feature instant messaging, presence and contact management features. Web Conferencing software is related to Web Collaboration software.

related_products.short_desc: Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants.
related_products.features: Communicate your ideas powerfully using Adobe Connect web conferencing software. Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants - all using a web browser and the Adobe Flash Player runtime, already installed on 98% of Internet-connected personal computers.

related_products.short_desc:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace.
Simple. Smart. Trusted.
related_products.features:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace. We bring video, audio and web conferencing together with the collaboration tools people use every day.

The first cloud service to connect desktops, mobile devices and room systems in one video meeting, BlueJeans makes meetings fast to join and simple to use, so people can work productively where and how they want.

It is the meeting solution teams trust to do their best work.

related_products.short_desc: Built for learning, our fully redesigned web conferencing solution allows employees to fulfill training requirements anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: Focused on education and training, Blackboard Collaborate is designed for simplicity, accessibility and to support education and training workflows. Whether it's an online meeting, virtual group training, or connecting remote employees, our one-click virtual training solution offers a level of connection and engagement that makes learners forget that they're not in a physical space.

related_products.short_desc: NO PINS. NO DOWNLOADS. NO PROBLEM.
related_products.features: Dialpad Meetings changed online meetings forever by killing PINs and making it simple for people to join. With powerful call controls, seamless screen sharing, and HD calls and video, its easier than ever to stay connected no matter where work finds you.

related_products.short_desc: vFairs elevates your video conferencing to an unforgettable attendee experience to let you connect & engage with audiences at scale.
related_products.features: vFairs elevates your video conferencing to an unforgettable attendee experience. Webinars can integrate with any webcasting tools, including Zoom, Vimeo, YouTube and WebEx, to provide a fully immersive, value-driven experience. Host webinars that keep attendees engaged with live translation, AI-powered transcription, and interactive features like Q&A, polling and interactive whiteboard features. Connect & engage with audiences at scale within an intuitive, immersive 3D virtual conference venue.

related_products.short_desc: Livestorm is an end-to-end video engagement platform that enables you to connect, engage, and capture actionable insights in one place.
related_products.features:
Livestorm enables powerful, yet pain-free video engagements at scale. 

Our end-to-end video engagement platform enables organizations to create professional video engagements that can be easily managed in one place.

It's a browser-based platform that doesn't require a download, or setup. You can use Livestorm for on-demand, live, or pre-recorded meetings or events.

Try Slack with your team for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Jumbo is a fully integrated and customizable virtual events and live streaming software tool.
similar_products.features: Jumbo builds the world's most customizable live streaming and video platforms. Our platforms are fully integrated and tailor made for your brand. Features include registration, ticketing, live chat, virtual breakout rooms, trivia, polls, and on-demand user data. Our full service event production team will assist you in crafting the pristine video content. Perfect for virtual conferences, fundraisers, online education, live streaming, hosting premium content, Learning Management System, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 sales meeting platform used to cut down ramp time, boost sales productivity and increase close rates.
similar_products.features:
Demodesk is the meeting platform built specifically for sales. We empower customer-facing reps to become top performers by guiding them in real-time, automating non-selling tasks and engaging customers on a whole new level. 

Our breakthrough screen sharing technology makes meetings truly interactive.

Leading SaaS companies are using Demodesk to cut down ramp time, increase quota attainment, lift sales productivity, and accelerate growth.

similar_products.short_desc: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size
similar_products.features: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size, from one-person firms to multinational enterprises. The web-based solution is easy to use and covers the entire webinar process from preparation to presentation, and from interaction to follow-up. The software requires no installation and works on all devices and operating systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Build every in-person, virtual, and hybrid event with Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform - The Event Experience OS.
similar_products.features: Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform powers immersive in-person, virtual, and hybrid experiences for the world's leading brands. The Bizzabo Event Experience OS is a data-rich open platform that empowers Event Experience Leaders to manage events, engage audiences, activate communities, and deliver powerful business outcomes. Bizzabo was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in New York and Tel-Aviv.

similar_products.short_desc: Schools use Parents Booking to schedule and host in-person and/or video meetings for parent-teacher conferences.
similar_products.features:
Parents Booking is used by thousands of schools around the world to connect millions of parents and teachers for in-person and/or timed video conversations.

Schools can try for free, and set up their parent-teacher conferences in minutes by connecting their school database and importing the required 'data' automatically.

Proven to increase your school's parent-teacher attendance and conversations, save money and save time, Parents Booking is the answer to all your 'parental engagement' needs.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Audio Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Audio Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Audio Conferencing software allows multiple people to dial in and join the same audio-only call. This type of software may also include live chat, call recording, video conferencing, and other features that enable online communication between remote teams, stakeholders, and customers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Streaming software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Streaming tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Streaming software allows organizations to broadcast live event feeds over the internet and engage with their target audience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Meeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Meeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Meeting software enables teams to coordinate, schedule, conduct, and participate in collaborative meetings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Presentation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Screen Recording software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Screen Recording tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Screen Recording software allows users to take capture audio and video clips from their screens and other devices such as webcams. These media files can be edited, annotated, and converted to various formats, as well as uploaded to help businesses with training, tutorials, demos, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Screen Sharing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtual Classroom software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Virtual Classroom tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Virtual Classroom Software allows teachers and instructors to engage with learners in an online setting. These products offer interactive whiteboards to share notes/lessons, attendance tracking, live chat, and breakout rooms to encourage collaboration between participants.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Web Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Web Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Web Conferencing software enables organizations to conduct interactive conferences and meetings online. Typical features include: two-way audio, video conferencing, application sharing, presentation streaming, presence/availability detection and electronic hand raising. Web Conferencing applications also often feature instant messaging, presence and contact management features. Web Conferencing software is related to Web Collaboration software.

category_features.name: Electronic Hand Raising
category_features.definition: Participants can alert the Host that they have a question when they are muted.

category_features.name: HD Audio/Video
category_features.definition: High-definition audio capability

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: On-Demand Webcasting
category_features.definition: An on-demand webcast is a pre-recorded presentation, which is available online at the viewer?s convenience.

category_features.name: Presentation Streaming
category_features.definition: Stream slide presentations during the web conference to present it to the audience

category_features.name: Presentation Tools
category_features.definition: Share and present designs

category_features.name: Private Chat
category_features.definition: Send text messages to selected individual(s) from the entire audience

category_features.name: Real-Time Chat
category_features.definition: Engage in direct, instant messaging

category_features.name: Recording
category_features.definition: Record live video calls to play later

category_features.name: Screen Sharing
category_features.definition: Digitally share screen view with others

category_features.name: Two Way Audio & Video
category_features.definition: Presenter can see and hear participants and vice versa.

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Adds audio/visual capabilities for remote learners and instructors

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Customizable Branding
category_features.definition: Add customized logos and colors to the interface

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Multi hosts
category_features.definition: Allow multiple participants to present/co-host.

category_features.name: On-Demand Webinars
category_features.definition: Allow users to schedule a webinar with registration and record the webinar automatically in the cloud.

category_features.name: Polls/Voting
category_features.definition: Create quick polls to keep people engaged

category_features.name: Q&A Management
category_features.definition: Answer attendee questions privately or publicly.

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Screen Sharing
category_features.definition: Enable users to share screen during a presentation.

category_features.name: Social Promotion
category_features.definition: Share webinar on various social media channels.

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

related_products.short_desc: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across a multitude of systems.
related_products.features: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across everything from your mobile and desktop devices to telephones and conference room systems. Special features include cloud and local recording with transcripts and multi-user annotation capabilities via screen share.  Easy access with one click, chat across platforms and share files all with encrypted, compliant settings for extra security.

related_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
related_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

related_products.short_desc: Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.
related_products.features:
Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.

Make meetings more interactive and engaging
-	Reduce disruptions with background noise removal and voice enhancement
-	Enable audiences to share their reactions with animated emojis and gesture recognition
-	Improve audience engagement with next-gen dynamic polling and Q&A by Slido
-	Customize the stage layout to focus on the content and people that matters most

related_products.short_desc: Ridiculously simple screen sharing tool for meetings on the fly. Get everybody on the same page, when they're not in the same room!
related_products.features: join.me is the fastest and easiest way to connect and collaborate. Anyone can share ideas instantly with screen sharing, audio, video, whiteboard and chat. join.me is a personalized meeting experience where users can personalize participant bubbles, URLs, backgrounds and more!

related_products.short_desc: Web conferencing tool that helps businesses with instant messaging, voice & video calls, voice messaging, desktop sharing, conferencing
related_products.features: Web conferencing tool that helps businesses with instant messaging, voice & video calls, voice messaging, desktop sharing, conferencing. Designed for midsize to large businesses in consulting, finance, healthcare, and other industries, it is a web conferencing tool that provides team messaging, remote collaboration, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like chat, video calling, posts and groups.
related_products.features: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like Chat, video calling, posts and Groups. It integrates with the business tools you already use and provides a simple, secure and more productive way for people to share knowledge, work together and build connected communities.

related_products.short_desc: Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants.
related_products.features: Communicate your ideas powerfully using Adobe Connect web conferencing software. Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants - all using a web browser and the Adobe Flash Player runtime, already installed on 98% of Internet-connected personal computers.

related_products.short_desc:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace.
Simple. Smart. Trusted.
related_products.features:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace. We bring video, audio and web conferencing together with the collaboration tools people use every day.

The first cloud service to connect desktops, mobile devices and room systems in one video meeting, BlueJeans makes meetings fast to join and simple to use, so people can work productively where and how they want.

It is the meeting solution teams trust to do their best work.

related_products.short_desc: Built for learning, our fully redesigned web conferencing solution allows employees to fulfill training requirements anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: Focused on education and training, Blackboard Collaborate is designed for simplicity, accessibility and to support education and training workflows. Whether it's an online meeting, virtual group training, or connecting remote employees, our one-click virtual training solution offers a level of connection and engagement that makes learners forget that they're not in a physical space.

related_products.short_desc: NO PINS. NO DOWNLOADS. NO PROBLEM.
related_products.features: Dialpad Meetings changed online meetings forever by killing PINs and making it simple for people to join. With powerful call controls, seamless screen sharing, and HD calls and video, its easier than ever to stay connected no matter where work finds you.

similar_products.short_desc: ConveneAGM is the AGM solution that enables you to conduct virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings in compliance to existing guidelines.
similar_products.features: ConveneAGM is the end-to-end eAGM conference solution designed to conduct engaging virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings. Organizations can hold a real-time AGM broadcast where shareholders can register, vote on resolutions, send proxy forms, and participate in live Q&A. It streamlines the AGM process and requirements into an all-in-one platform to aid secretaries, scrutineers, and share registrars. ConveneAGM is developed by Azeus, a CMMI Level 5 company and an expert in process efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: TrainerCentral is an online course platform, with an in-build video conferencing functionality to host webinars and live workshops.
similar_products.features: Turn learning into a two-way street by simulating an in-person environment with a host of engagement features and tools. TrainerCentral's virtual classroom streams your training videos in HD, engaging your remote learners like you're standing right in front of them.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast, simple, and secure co-browsing and collaboration technology that lets you upgrade any conversation, from any channel, seamlessly.
similar_products.features:
Surfly provides co-browsing and collaboration technology that lets you upgrade any conversation, from any channel, seamlessly, and support customers as if you are sitting side-by-side. 

Surfly is easily customized to fit any customer experience flow. You can launch co-browsing sessions directly from your site or platform and change look & feel so it matches your branding.

Surfly enhances interactions on your platform in real-time. Without writing a single line of code or installing software.

similar_products.short_desc: Glisser is an award-winning technology platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events.
similar_products.features:
Glisser is an award-winning platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events. We enable companies to power engaging event experiences by offering a ready-to-go event platform and a completely customizable solution that lets you take control of the look and feel of your virtual events.

Glisser Elements is our platform distilled down to its purest form. Our virtual and hybrid event Software Development Kits (SDKs) allow you to create unique virtual environments, inside your own websites.

similar_products.short_desc: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size
similar_products.features: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size, from one-person firms to multinational enterprises. The web-based solution is easy to use and covers the entire webinar process from preparation to presentation, and from interaction to follow-up. The software requires no installation and works on all devices and operating systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
similar_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

similar_products.short_desc: BigMarker is the world's most customizable platform for webinars, virtual and hybrid events.
similar_products.features: BigMarker is a fully customizable virtual conference platform that combines powerful video technology with robust marketing and interactive experience capabilities to create unique branded virtual events.

similar_products.short_desc: A web conferencing solution that empowers you to host interactive online meeting, video conferencing and organize engaging webinars.
similar_products.features: Zoho Meeting is a robust web conferencing solution built for your online meeting and webinar needs. It is completely browser-based and attendees don't need to download any application to attend a meeting or webinar. Keep your meetings handy using the desktop plugin for Windows and Mac, iOS app, android app, Google Chrome extension, Firefox extension, embed widget and calendar integrations. Embed webinar registration, polls, Q&A, allow to talk, recording, in-depth analytics, etc

similar_products.short_desc: FreeConferenceCall.com offers HD audio conferencing and online meetings for up to 1,000 participants  all for free.
similar_products.features: FreeConferenceCall.com offers HD audio conferencing and online meetings with screen sharing and video conferencing for up to 1,000 participants. Hosting more than 40 million conferences annually, FreeConferenceCall.com has grown to become the largest and most recognized conferencing provider on the planet. Every account includes unlimited conference calls, screen sharing, video conferencing, recording, security features, calendar integrations, mobile applications and much more  all for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
similar_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use, feature-rich conferencing solution. Audio, video, screen sharing and much more with up to 1,000 participants.
similar_products.features:
Grow your business with a conferencing service that doesnt limit you the bigger you get, or restrict features to make you upgrade.

With StartMeeting we give you all the conferencing and online meeting features you need right off the bat, with up to 1,000 audio, web and video participants  all for a flat rate of $12.95 a month.

similar_products.short_desc: Build every in-person, virtual, and hybrid event with Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform - The Event Experience OS.
similar_products.features: Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform powers immersive in-person, virtual, and hybrid experiences for the world's leading brands. The Bizzabo Event Experience OS is a data-rich open platform that empowers Event Experience Leaders to manage events, engage audiences, activate communities, and deliver powerful business outcomes.
